title: Metro.2033.Redux.Update.1.and.2-CODEX
description:
Metro.2033.Redux.Update.1.and.2-CODEX


   

   CODEX PRESENTS:
  
                     Metro: 2033 REDUX - Update 1 and 2 

    Release Date :  8/2014                         Protection : Steam
    Discs        :  1                              Genre      : FPS 

    
    

   
    For list of changes read included patchnotes.txt 

   - Extract
   - Run setup.exe and install update to your gamedir
   - Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
   - Play 

   Notes: This patch requires: CODEX release of Metro 2033 REDUX 

   Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
   online .. 


  [Changelog
  
  - Fixed crash after intro on some configurations
